1.title: Episode #1.1

episode of.title: Real & Chance: The Legend Hunters (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: First up, Real and Chance travel to Stillwater, Oklahoma where they're on the hunt for Lee's Monster, a legendary 130 pound catfish. Could this be the year the beast is finally caught?

2.title: The Shark Whisperer

episode of.title: Real & Chance: The Legend Hunters (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: Real and Chance head to Nassau, Bahamas to meet with legendary "Shark Whisperer" Stuart Cove.

3.title: Hogasaurus

episode of.title: Real & Chance: The Legend Hunters (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: Real and Chance are off to the small town of Union Springs, Alabama. It's been reported that a "Hogasaurus" has been sighted in the Alabama forest.

4.title: Python

episode of.title: Real & Chance: The Legend Hunters (TV Series 2010– )

4.plot: Real and Chance face their biggest, deadliest, and slimiest challenge yet as they head to the wilds ofSouth Florida in a search for a 20' long super-python.

5.title: Wolf

episode of.title: Real & Chance: The Legend Hunters (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: What has been killing the livestock and roaming the hills around the Lazy Lizard Ranch? In order to find out, Real and Chance will need to face attack dogs, wild wolves, and a Native American vision quest.

6.title: Bigfoot

episode of.title: Real & Chance: The Legend Hunters (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: The Legend Hunters take to the woods of the Angeles National Forest in a quest to find, confront, and photograph the biggest legend of all time, Bigfoot!

7.title: Cougar

episode of.title: Real & Chance: The Legend Hunters (TV Series 2010– )

7.plot: When a rogue cougar menaces the residents of Hesperia, California, the legend hunters ride in to the rescue.

8.title: Crocodile

episode of.title: Real & Chance: The Legend Hunters (TV Series 2010– )

8.plot: Real and Chance, they must attempt to team with fearless reptile researcher Juan Sanchez in the Legend Hunters most dangerous mission yet!

9.title: Grizzly

episode of.title: Real & Chance: The Legend Hunters (TV Series 2010– )

9.plot: When a rogue Grizzly bear named Thunderclaw menaces Montana's Smoking Rock Ranch, Real and Chance spring to the rescue with bear expert and Nat Geo Wild host Casey Anderson.

10.title: Venom

episode of.title: Real & Chance: The Legend Hunters (TV Series 2010– )

10.plot: The rainforests surrounding the Arenal Volcano is one of the deadliest places on earth with venomous creatures. In order to obtain samples of the venom, Real and Chance will be forced to enlist the help of Donald Schultz.

imdb.plot outline: Stallionaires brothers Real and Chance are back to traverse the wilderness in search of nature's legendary creatures (The Mega Shark, Big Foot, Hogzilla, The Chupacabrah). Each week they learn the tales of each quarry from locals and experts before embarking on their adventures. The legends are out there. Can these guys find them? Probably not, but it will be fun to watch them.
imdb.title: Real & Chance: The Legend Hunters
akas: Real & Chance: The Legend Hunters (United States)
plot: Show about two brothers from VH1's Real Chance of Love. Real and Chance are back and this time they are on the hunt for mythical creatures such as: The Mega Shark, Bigfoot, and Hogzilla.::Anonymous

Stallionaires brothers Real and Chance are back to traverse the wilderness in search of nature's legendary creatures (The Mega Shark, Big Foot, Hogzilla, The Chupacabrah). Each week they learn the tales of each quarry from locals and experts before embarking on their adventures. The legends are out there. Can these guys find them? Probably not, but it will be fun to watch them.::VH1
